casebody.data:
Michael HAZEL
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 28, 2018

Michael W. Brown, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Melissa Patterson, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

*964The petitioner Michael Hazel's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 534, 179 A.3d 813 (2018), is denied.
